item.description:
Learn everything there is to learn about 9s, the Peacemaker, strengths, defenses, subtypes, growth issues, relationship dynamics. Perfect for anyone in relationship with a 9.

 

7:30 to 9:30/10.

 

Herb Pearce, Enneagram expert for over 20 years, is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and also Herb's Tips for Living. Herb is a therapist and coach for individuals, couples and families and worked with relationship dynamics between people for over 31 years. He leads trainings in organizations for team building and staff development.

www.herbpearce.com

781 648 3737
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
